subject: Re: [junit] Difference running junit in ant compared to Eclipse
msgSnippet: Hi Mikael, We need more information than that. What versions of JUnit, Ant, and Eclispe are you using, and what does your Test do? Steve. Stephen Smith, MEng
messageBody:
Hi Mikael,

We need more information than that. What versions of JUnit, Ant, and
Eclispe are you using, and what does your Test do?

Steve.

Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales).
http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/

eraonel wrote:
>
>
> Hi,
>
> I execute a Junit test in Eclipse fine. Then when I run the same test
> in Ant I get a NullPointerException.
> Have anyone experienced the same problem?
>
> Any hints!
>
> cheers,
>
> //mikael
